Content: @meatspoon i am guessing i have a bit more tech background that you do. my assessment is that ETH has a very difficult tech problem to solve and certainly they can transition to PoS and fill the need for easy to write low volume dapps, but the GAS model is just too expensive for any mass market usage

Content: maybe going to PoS, they can do tricks to get fast block times to push scaling that way for a bit, but who can sync an ETH chain from scratch as it is now?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: maybe that doesnt mattter, maybe it does

Content: having all transactions going to a main chain , but having it separated out into different shards and making that accurate and secure...
